lines.text: Hm... that statue's stone, not wax.
So... those melted candles... maybe, um...
Maybe this was an illicit wax statue counterfeiting operation?
Yeah! They were gonna take this stone statue, and cover it in wax so it'd look like a wax statue!
And then sell it to a wax museum for muchos dollars!
...Somehow, I don't think that is the nature of the crime bein' committed here.
